mapper.select: insert into site_pages (page_id, page_url, page_type, site_id, entity_type_id) values (#{page.id}, #{page.url}, #{page.type}, #{page.siteId}, #{page.entityTypeId})

select sp.page_id, sp.page_url, sp.page_type, sp.page_status, sp.site_id, sp.entity_type_id, s.site_name, et.entity_type, ea.attr_key, ea.attr_type, ea.attr_el, ea.attr_name from site_pages sp, sites s, site_entity_types et, site_entity_attrs ea where sp.page_status = 3 and sp.create_date > #{tsAfter} and sp.site_id = s.site_id and sp.entity_type_id = et.entity_type_id and sp.entity_type_id = ea.entity_type_id order by sp.last_update asc
